bug.author: omrizen
bug.summary: semantic segmentation does not work properly on props ingestion- version 0.9.8 linux from source
bug.description: Hello working on carla release 0.9.8 on linux from source after prop ingestion (using json file with tag e.g. - { "maps": [ ],"props": [ { "name": "MyProp01", "size": "big", "source": "./props/prop01/prop01.fbx", "tag": "Vehicles"} ]} ) the image that I get with semantic segmentation sensor colores the object in black (so my tag has no effect). I found out the "render custom" is disabled on my prop after start playing , comparing to other constant actors in the scene, so perhaps this should be fixed Thanks

comments.comment: Did you try with 0.9.9? Any differences?
I have similar issue on 0.9.9 version See: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/3070>#3070</denchmark-link>
